history.proof: intros x y z. hauto unfold: AbelianGroup.plus, AbelianGroup.sort, plus.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ x y) (AbelianGroup.plus G _ x y) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ (plus x y) z) (AbelianGroup.plus G _ (plus x y) z) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ y z) (AbelianGroup.plus G _ y z) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment G : AbelianGroup s : G -> G -> G x, y, z, X : G Unable to unify "s (s x y) z" with "s x (s y z)".

original: intros x y z. rewrite (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ x y). rewrite (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ (plus x y) z). rewrite (AbelianGroup.ax1 G _ y z). reflexivity.
